title: Very New & Swanky Apt on the East Side
posting_body: Check out this insane deal on a brand spanking new 1/1 in the heart of East Austin (one of the most up and coming areas of ATX!)
This property is hosting walkability to some of Austins most fun & interesting restaurants, bars, coffee shops within a short walk and an even shorter bike ride!
It even has a on-site dog park for your four legged friend, he will thank you later!
A few of the communities other most exciting features include a sky lounge, bike storage (and repair), cistern patio, fitness center and pool courtyard.
The community is offering a special right now of a $2000 dollar amex gift card for signing a lease AND a free parking spot!
This apartment isn't going to stay on the market long so CALL or TEXT Trent today!!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
